secure.title: Secure
secure.subtitle: Our UnitaryAid`s Trust & Safety team works around the clock to protect against fraud.

flex.first: We check incoming applications to ensure that identity documents are valid
flex.second: We identify the urgent needs of citizens in the territory of Ukraine
flex.third: We prioritise requests according to the urgency and strategic importance of the need
flex.forth: We carry out the project: fundraising, procurement, logistics, etc
flex.fifth: We receive reports and monitor the use of support

left_section.title: Authorization with
left_section.subtitle: This is a way to verify your identity with your bank. Select your bank from the list, enter your internet banking login and password. The NBU Bank ID system is used by: Monobank, PrivatBank, Oschadbank, Rife, Sense Bank and more than 35 other banks.

how_work.title: Please, create a new password:
